name: Fast Tempo Soccer
description:
This is an innovative 2 VS 2 soccer game which is different from traditional boring soccer games.
You don't have to concern about strategy, formation and offside in the game. All the thing you need to do is to control your two players to shoot when the opportunity comes to you.
I promise that you will be amused by the curious but interesting postures of the players. It’s time to invite your friends to experience the pleasure of crazy shooting together!
